text: A dicastery is the name of some departments in the Roman Curia of the Catholic Church. ==Current dicasteries == As of 2022, there are sixteen dicasteries: Congregation Current prefect Country Picture Dicastery for the Doctrine of the Faith Víctor Manuel Fernández Dicastery for Divine Worship and the Discipline of the Sacraments Arthur Roche Dicastery for Evangelization Luis Antonio Tagle Dicastery for the Causes of Saints Marcello Semeraro Dicastery for Bishops Robert Francis Prevost Dicastery for the Clergy Lazarus You Heung-sik Dicastery for the Eastern Churches Claudio Gugerotti Dicastery for Institutes of Consecrated Life and Societies of Apostolic Life Simona Brambilla Dicastery for Culture and Education José Tolentino de Mendonça Dicastery for the Service of Charity Konrad Krajewski Dicastery for the Laity, Family and Life Kevin Farrell Dicastery for Promoting Christian Unity Kurt Koch Dicastery for Interreligious Dialogue George Koovakad Dicastery for Promoting Integral Human Development Michael Czerny Dicastery for Legislative Texts Filippo Iannone Dicastery for Communication Paolo Ruffini ==References== Category:Catholicism
